name: Flowing Blade Harpoon-Thrower
description:
A warrior from the source of the springs, and a tribal guardian that patrols the waters and shores.
Underestimate the incredible skills these brave harpoon-wielding warriors have gained through hunting and fishing at your peril. It is said that in the past, tribespeople would use these skills to hunt massive sea beasts with fins and scales as tough as iron.

investigation.name: Sauroform Tribal Warriors
investigation.description: The warriors of Natlan's six great tribes who fight for the honor and glory of their people.\nOver long years of living and fighting alongside their Saurian companions, these tribal warriors have gradually acquired their traits and learned how to apply them on the field of battle.
